name: Evolo.The Sun
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Evolo is an clicker about an ancient story, where you are only a dream. In dream you must clicking for achievement your goals. Dont break your dream and continue!

If you want to break the dream, then just press Esc.

Be carefull, you cant save the dream!

This game is prehistory of the great world of Evolo.

Features:
★ An interesting and unusual plot.
★ Simple and relaxing gameplay
★ Convenient and easy control
